Nothing beats a well-reasoned creative, that is based on in-depth research.

That’s why we work according to our effective method, regardless of our vast experience and excellent instincts.

Our expertise

1

Research

For a story to be told well, you must do your research. That’s why we put a lot of effort in asking the right questions at the beginning, so we’ll end up with the best answers.

Our goal is to ask whomever it takes to provide the most accurate, up-to-date information for the procedure - whether it be the customer, the employee, the supplier or even the CEO. As a result of this crucial step, we can define and map the brand's needs and goals, and we can gain relevant data for further business development.

2

Planning

Gathering and analyzing the data into a concise and business purposeful document, which includes:

  • Essence and goals
  • Strengths and advantages
  • Differentiation
  • Values
  • Market's insights
  • A clear & vivid strategy
  • Tactical actions

This document is a true strategic road map for the company and for everyone who's involved with it, to move forward together in the same direction.

3

Establishment

When learning’s done, it’s time to apply all the knowledge we’ve gained through the prism of creativity… Now that all the building blocks are here, we can start to design and to build the brand, according to the strategic road map:

  • Translating all the insights we
    obtained into a visual and
    textual language.
  • Creating the brand entity,
    appearance and voice.
  • Generating the brand assets:
    website, presentations,
    merchandise, brand book, etc.
4

Kick-Start

This is where the real fun begins... The Brand is launched both internal and outside the organization. The internal stage includes events such as:

  • Workshops to implement the brand’s assets
  • Launching events to create a real team spirit

These activities help the employees to tell the brand’s story through their eyes and be proud of the change, and take an active part in it.

The next stage is to tell the news to the whole world - on all the right platforms, and In addition to that, we never forget that a satisfied customer is the best marketing agent there is, so for the brand’s existing clients we empahsize how this change can be beneficial for them. After all, they are the brand’s most genuine ambassadors.

5

Implementation

A true brand is a living thing. It is constantly evolving, responding to trends and changes - while maintaining its essence, true voice and approach. That’s why we believe managing a brand has to be conducted in 2 levels:

  • Telling the brand’s story consistently, by creating new and relevant content.
  • Keeping an eye on the company’s goals and targets in order to adjust and sync the brand’s language.

Get yourself a well-experienced team-player, by your side.
